title: River flows drop as carbon dioxide creates thirstier plants (UNSW - The University of New ...
text: ( Source : UNSW - The University of New South Wales) Rivers in many agriculturally significant areas of Australia could lose water as the landscape grows greener, write Anna Ukkola and Albert Van Dijk . OPINION: Rising carbon dioxide
